text:
Premier League
Everton: the message of Andr√© Gomes after his terrible injury
Injured very seriously in the ankle, Andr√© Gomes will miss long months of competition. After his injury, he wanted to send a message to his supporters.
06 Nov 2019, 19:26 by Antoine Chirat



The image has been around the world, and it is still cold in the back. Taken in contact with Son and Aurier against Tottenham, Andr√© Gomes suffered a broken ankle, forcing him to leave the field very quickly on a stretcher before being operated on. Today, he posted a video on his networks to thank fans for support: "Hi everyone! As you know, everything went very well, I'm already at home with my family. thank you all for your support, your messages and your positive energy Thank you ".
